nodes.text: The First Mission on Teth was one of two operations during the battle of Teth where a squad of Republic clone troopers was tasked with recovering datapacks that had fallen into enemy hands.

During the hunt to rescue Rotta, the son of Jabba Desilijic Tiure, Republic scouts found him on Teth. Sometime during the mission to rescue the hutt, a group of clone troopers had the task of retrieving 7 datapacks in order to keep them from the droids.

While on their quest to retrieve the datapacks, the clones faced opposition from B1 and B2 battle droids. The clones defeated their opponents and successfully recovered the datapacks. Because of this the droids were unable to secure the republic information.

This mission only appears in the online video game Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Live Fire which was part of the advertising campaign for the Clone Wars film. Because of this, the canonicity of this information is ambiguos.
